Our Core Services Portfolio

Mobile Valeting

Convenient fully equipped mobile service at your location for a fast, quality clean.

Paint Correction

Multi-stage polishing to remove swirl marks, oxidation, and scratches for a true showroom finish.

Ceramic Coating

Long-lasting paint protection with accredited, professional-grade SiO2 and SiC products.

Paint Protection Film (PPF)

Invisible, self-healing film to guard against stone chips, scratches, and abrasions.

Engine Bay Detailing

Thorough, safe degreasing and cleaning for a spotless and well-maintained engine bay.

Interior Deep Cleaning

Vapor cleaning, extraction, and deep sanitisation for carpets, seats, and all interior surfaces.

Our Meticulous Detailing Process

A step-by-step commitment to excellence, ensuring your vehicle receives a comprehensive, professional treatment from start to spectacular finish.

1

1. Consultation & Assessment

We discuss your needs and conduct a thorough 30-point inspection of your vehicle's condition.

2

2. Preparation & Decontamination

Safe, multi-stage wash and full chemical and mechanical decontamination of all exterior surfaces.

3

3. Correction & Enhancement

Multi-stage machine polishing to safely remove defects and maximize paint clarity and gloss.

4

4. Protection Application

Application of chosen protection: ceramic coating, sealant, or wax, ensuring maximum durability.

5

5. Final Detail & Inspection

Detailed interior valeting, final wipe-down, and a joint final quality check with the client.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the difference between valeting and detailing?
Valeting is generally a deep clean, focusing on presentation. Detailing is a more meticulous, restorative process that involves paint correction and long-term protection like ceramic coating, aimed at restoring and preserving the finish.
How long does a ceramic coating last?
Our professional, accredited ceramic coatings typically last between 3 to 7 years, depending on the product, preparation, and maintenance. We provide detailed care instructions upon completion.
Can you remove deep scratches?
We can safely remove light to moderate scratches (those confined to the clear coat) with paint correction. Deep scratches (down to the primer/metal) may require professional bodywork, but we can advise on the best solution.
